name: Escape The Thin Ice
description:
Survive the excursion home, reach the castle and avoid the obstacles in your path!

How to Play:

1. start by clicking on the player

2. Then utilize the movement keys on your keyboard to navigate through the obstacles on your way home (the castle) 

Hints: the path is very fragile, and it will be difficult to navigate through! However, you should get the hang of it when you figure out which tiles are the true obstacles. Also, player respawn is not working so you have to refresh the game if you wish to play again!
